2010310.description:
If you are interested in puzzle games, 369 will appeal to you
Join 369 in an adventure full of excitement and fear and find your way through a dangerous labyrinth by destroying demonic creatures and solving various puzzles. 369 takes you with it and plunges you into the depth of a story full of excitement, apprehension and fear and shows you the way of life.
It leads you through deadly mazes and full of dangerous traps, and when you reach the three-headed dragon, you have to fight him with all your might.
But before the battle to the big dragon, you have to deal with the space robots and bomb and destroy their equipment.
You need to upgrade your weapons because you won't last long with the existing weapons
I have participated in this battle many times and have a lot of experience, so listen to the advice of an experienced warrior.
................................................................
369 challenges your mind hard. You need all your intelligence to solve the puzzles of the game. This is not a shooting game. You only have a shield that you will get from the third stage and no other weapons. You have to think to solve the puzzles.
Of course, in the mini game you have an advanced laser weapon that can be upgraded and updated.
2010310.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 阿拉伯语
